manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TAKE THE STRESS OUT OF THE MESS Your home is your haven. O-Cedar's quality cleaning products keep your home looking and feeling great. For over a century, we’ve designed solutions that require less effort to provide a truly clean home. From our EasyWring Spin Mop to our ProMist MAX double-sided Microfiber Spray Mop, that remove dirt and grime with just water. Our innovative products have made it easier for people to maintain a clean, comfortable home.

EASIER CLEANING No matter the size of your home, the nature of the room, or how many four-legged friends reside with you, O-Cedar has the right mop, broom, or sponge for the right job. All of our products clean deeply and thoroughly, offering you and your loved ones a satisfying clean that you can feel and trust.

A CLEAN YOU CAN FEEL Clean requires action. But clean is also a feeling. One of comfort and satisfaction in a job well done, and also one of confidence—the kind that comes with knowing your home’s floors are the perfect spot for everything from playing to relaxing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly the kind of dust pan I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Lighter than a metal dustpan, heavier than a thin plastic one, really seems to be just the correct weight. Stiff but not brittle with a rubber edge on the floor end to keep the dust from escaping under the dustpan. Shaped to fit securely on the broom handle, where ever you want to place it. I leave it just high enough that it's off the broom's bristles to allow me to sweep the floor, then it's right where it should be when I snap it off the broom to pick up the sweepings. None of the fine dust sticks to the pan when you dump it, just good O-Cedar quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wide ramp
reviews.reviewText: Works well. The brush catcher on the side is a nice feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fulfills it description
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this dustpan. It very securely snaps onto my broom handle and does not move or spin after attachment. It is truly anti static. It is actually fun to watch the dirt and dust just flow into the wastebasket, leaving the dustpan all clean! I have never had that happen before. I always had to bang previous dustpans on the side of wastebasket to get the "clinging" dust and dirt to drop off. I had to show my hubby how cool it was. So far the rubber along the edge does block dirt from sliding under while sweeping up dust/dirt piles. I hope that part holds up. Time will tell. OH! almost forgot, the rubber block of "teeth" to knock fuzz balls off the bottom of broom works great also! I just could not be happier with this dustpan. :-) Needless to say, the last one I bought (different brand) was NOT so great. I happily gave that piece of junk to my hubby to use in the garage!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Antistatic does repel dust, but rubber edge isn't super sharp and the ledge isn't deep.
reviews.reviewText: Antistatic does repel dust so everything drops into the trash without static cling.The rubber edge is OK, but I've seen sharper.The ledge that keeps dirt from falling out as you lift this off the floor and go to dump it is rather shallow, so I often drop dust and have to sweep it again. Less clumsy people will be able to keep the dustpan steady and level.The dustpan handle enthusiastically snaps onto and grips the short Quickie-brand "lobby broom" used in hotels and restaurants to tidy up discreetly.It's good, but I'm picky--this is the third dustpan I've tried in as many years.

reviews.reviewText: The broom scraper is a nice feature.
